unnormalised: Yeah, yeah, India became independent on 15/08/1947, we all know that! Still celebrating it like it was yesterday... maybe because I still can't get over the fact that my grandma says she was *there*... at like, -5 years old!
normalised: Yeah, yeah, India became independent on fifteenth august nineteen forty seven, we all know that! Still celebrating it like it was yesterday... maybe because I still can't get over the fact that my grandma says she was *there*... at like, minus five years old!
